title: The Last taboos
creator_credit: Cavalcade Productions, Ginger Blackwell and Dale McCulley
brief_description: Documentary dealing with the effects of childhood sexual abuse and is not intended as a study or demonstration of counselling techniques shown - the subject matter is emotionally charged and maybe disturbing. Group counselling American style, it encourages victims to talk about their experiences and to act out their anger, with good results.
